label: 律師
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The lowest on the ladder of ecclesiastical ranks accessible to elite, fully ordained priests.  In the time of the tale it is still a distinguished appointment--more so than in later times.   “Discipline” means the body of Buddhist monastic discipline (Skt. Vinaya).[also read Rishi][RK]
